attributes.action: Provide West Sussex schools with interim funding until new funding is in place.
attributes.additional_details: For more information see the Worthless campaign details.
attributes.background: Schools in West Sussex receive considerably less funding than other areas of the country to educate children. (Approx £200 per pupil) This will potentially result in schools reducing teaching to 4 days a week until a new funding formula is implemented due to such shortages in current school budgets.
